mapper.select: select role.role_id,role.role_name from user inner join user_role on user.username = user_role.username inner join role on user_role.role_id = role.role_id where user.username = #{username}

select permission.permission_id,permission.permission_code,permission.permission_name from user inner join user_role on user.username = user_role.username inner join role on user_role.role_id = role.role_id inner join role_permission on role.role_id = role_permission.role_id inner join permission on role_permission.permission_id = permission.permission_id where user.username = #{username}
